General.Name: Hunan Valin Wire & Cable Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Valin Wire & Cable Co. Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of wires and cables. The company provides power cables, special cables, electrical equipment, spare cables, and bare wires; and services, including house rental and storage. Hunan Valin Wire & Cable Co. Ltd. was founded in 1951 and is based in Xiangtan, China.
General.Address: No. 1, Jianshe South Road, Xiangtan, China, 411104
